original_text: For the moment all discipline seems painful rather than pleasant, but later it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness to those who have been trained by it.
korean_text: 무릇 징계가 당시에는 즐거워 보이지 않고 슬퍼 보이나 후에 그로 말미암아 연단 받은 자들은 의와 평강의 열매를 맺느니라

sentences.original_text: For the moment all discipline seems painful rather than pleasant
sentences.korean_translation: 지금은 모든 징계가 즐거운 것보다 괴로운 것처럼 보입니다

sentences.original_text: it yields the peaceful fruit of righteousness
to those who have been trained by it
